title: Convert images to .webp type
description:
This project focuses on converting images to the .webp format, a modern image format that offers superior compression. By converting images to .webp, file sizes are significantly reduced while maintaining nearly original visual quality.
This results in faster load times, reduced storage usage, and improved web performance.
It's an ideal solution for developers, designers, and content creators looking to optimize images without compromising quality.

details.title: Technology
details.text: React, Laravel, PHP, MySql, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS
